casebody.data:
No. 10-10386. Garth Bruce, Petitioner v. United States. 563 U.S. 1042, 131 S. Ct. 2980,

180 L. Ed. 2d 262,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 4231. June 6, 2011.

Petition for writ of certio-rari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.

Justice So-tomayor took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

*263Same case below, 633 F.3d 116.
